title: Prohibits the deferral of awards granted under the Tuition Assistance Program (TAP)
summary: Prohibits the deferral of awards granted under the Tuition Assistance Program (TAP); ensures that a TAP award will be paid on time so that the student may pay his or her tuition bill on time.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the deferral of awards granted under the Tuition Assistance Program (TAP)
